alert.note: Alert for Kent; Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 4:47PM EDT until September 09 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Sussex County in southern Delaware... Central Kent County in central Delaware... * Until 530 PM EDT. * At 447 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bowers, or 11 miles south of Dover, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dover, Milford, Harrington, Camden, Cheswold, Bowers, Woodside, Viola, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Dover Base Housing, Dover Speedway, Rising Sun, Big Stone Beach, Wyoming, Felton, Frederica, Houston, Magnolia, Little Creek and Leipsic. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
